Thanks for the explanation, chief. Greatly appreciate it.

Btw, this story (#76463, #99011) probably won't make a ton of sense later on since it's actually a continuation/spinoff of a couple earlier Kouzuki Rio mind control works that were never translated:

#62650 Saiminjutsu de Mesudorei wo Te ni Ireru Houhou - This one involves the creepy kid who teaches the brother hypnotism in the first chapter. He's the pawn of one of the adult hypnotists who both wear glasses and a butterfly rings. They both show up later in this manga.

#58914 Saiminjutsu de Kanojo o Midara ni Suru Houhou (pg 42) - This one (I think) involves the yandere girl who likes the sister in this manga. In this one, she's hypnotized a trained by the other adult hypnotist who wears glasses and a butterfly ring.

I remember this one. Someone started translating it forever ago but never did more than the first chapter. Anyway, more Kouzuki Rio stuff is always appreciated. Hopefully someone will do "JK Kanzen Shiiku Manual" one of these days. Always thought that was his best.
Very good finally a fun entertaining erotic plot containing Hentai hope it goes well in the future. It'd suck if it had a sad ending.
